<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Salve of Antiparalysis](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2940)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=663" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Applying this filmy salve to a creature helps it overcome magical paralysis. The salve attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the paralysis (counteract rank 3rd, counteract modifier +22). 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Salve of Antiparalysis (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 562 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

If the creature is petrified, it returns to normal, and for removing paralysis, the salve's counteract modifier is +31 and its counteract rank is 6th.
